Document:
# Gas Recycling Gas recycler is a machine that convert waste gasses into breathable ones.
They can recycle Carbon Dioxide and Nitrous Oxide into Oxygen and Nitrogen.
It has a two [textlink="pipenet" link="PipeNetworks"] connections, for gas input and output.
For the machine to work, tha gas needs to be pressurized to 3000 kPa, and heated to 573,15K.
